div.bibl: THE PHILIPPINE MESSENGER, Vol. II, No. 15, Sept. 1935"The Joint Affair by Two National Associations Brought $45 Profit"

body.p: The affair of the Filipino Association and the Associated Clubs given last August the thirty-first, at the Majestic Hotel, was a great success. The Occasion brought a profit of $45, which was equally divided by them. That to our community is a sure sign of co-operation, but will such an example lead us anywhere to achieve unity among ourselves?
